name: Mind Palace (grouter)
description:
Mind Palace

IMPORTANT: You can get stuck in the last x/3 (puzzle with 3 goals). Do not insert the last piece while being inside because you will not be able to push it away. Also you can freely skip the puzzle and not risk anything.

NOTE: Game is not saving progress... But it's short and sweet.

Controls: 

  • Move with arrow keys.
  • Push boxes with X
  • Pull boxes with Z
  • Close text prompts with X or Z
